  • Felton First Friday Art Walk

    December 3, 2014

    First Friday Felton Art Walk is an independent DIY (do it yourself) community event designed for the promotion and appreciation of local Artists and the Arts, and is managed in conjunction with the participating Felton Art venues (including The Satellite!).
